text:
Hello everyone, I have a question regarding the endpoint that registers the custom channel:

`<https://api.hubapi.com/conversations/v3/custom-channels?hapikey={YOUR_DEVELOPER_API_KEY}&appId={appId}>`

aren't API keys sunset? What key should I put here? I've been trying with the access token and getting the following error:

`"The scope needed for this API call isn't available for public use. If you have questions, contact support or post in our developer forum."`

Hey Milos, you can access your API key by navigating to Apps and clicking the Get HubSpot API key.
<@U07L87JHRHB> - double checking this is correct.
